text: On ruz, ki hamai onho avvalinu oxirin dar nazdi Parvardigorason oskor savand, hec ciz az amalhoi onho, ki dar dunjo karda ʙudand, ʙar Alloh pusida namonad. Alloh taolo mefarmojad: Imruz podsohi az oni kist? Boz Xud cavoʙ medihad: Az oni Allohi jaktoi qahhor, ki dar zot, nomho, sifatho va korhojas jagona ast va ʙa qudrat va izzati xud ʙar tamomi xaloiq ƣoliʙ ast
